alert.note: Alert for Chittenden; Franklin; Grand Isle; Lamoille (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 5:04PM EDT until July 21 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Clinton County in northern New York... Northeastern Essex County in northern New York... Northwestern Lamoille County in northwestern Vermont... Southern Grand Isle County in northwestern Vermont... Northern Chittenden County in northwestern Vermont... Southern Franklin County in northwestern Vermont... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 503 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Allen Point, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Burlington, South Burlington, Cambridge, Bakersfield, Cambridge Village, Westford, Jeffersonville Village, Colchester, Fairfax, South Hero, Belvidere Center, Georgia, Enosburg, Belvidere, Waterville, Georgia Center, Fletcher, Fairfield, Milton, and Johnson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
